participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, always looking for ways to help others.
participant_1.background: I wake up and start my day with a positive attitude, listening to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward. My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe. I just graduated college. I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects. I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and talkative, enjoys sharing experiences and learning from others.
participant_2.background: I took some time off to travel and explore my interests. I have a pet snake. I pay my employees minimum wage. My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table. I talk a lot in irc.

content.text: I'm doing well! How are you?
I'm good! I'm excited to start my first day of safety patrol!
That sounds awesome! What does that entail?
I'll be helping to keep my school safe by patrolling the halls and watching for any suspicious activity.
That's a great way to give back to your community!
Thanks! I'm excited to help out.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to crochet and collect yarn from different places.
That's so cool! I've never been able to crochet.
It's really easy to learn! I'm sure you could pick it up if you wanted to.
I might have to give it a try!
You should! It's really relaxing and you can make some really cool things.
